event.disclaimer: Restaurants are solely responsible for the service; availability and quality of the events including all or any cancellations/ modifications/ complaints.
event.description:
Ahoy, all you beautiful ladies! It's your day of the week again at KOB to drink, dance, let loose and just MISBEHAVE! Say hello to Miss Behave Nights every Thursday where we offer free shots to all girls. We also have unlimited sangrias at 599/- from 7 pm till closing, a Buy-One-Get-One offer on cocktails all night and a flat 10% off on food! It's time to get down and get wild! See you here!

event.title: Retro Night every Friday
event.disclaimer: Restaurants are solely responsible for the service; availability and quality of the events including all or any cancellations/ modifications/ complaints.
event.description:
#RetroNight# tonight at #Kaarobar#

Whether you're a student, entrepreneur with a startup or a corporate slave, we all get tired after a long work week. And the best way to relax and treat yourself is with some good music, food and drinks!

So head over to Kaar-O-Bar for our Retro Friday Nights! We're offering a Buy One Get One offer on drinks till 9 pm and a flat 10% off on food all night! All you need for a great start to the weekend. 

Call 088059 45555 for reservations.

THE SUNDAY DRUNCH with ABJI GEORGE
